elements.title: The Uselessness of Useful Knowledge
elements.contents: Today’s powerful but little-understood artificial intelligence breakthroughs echo past examples of unexpected scientific progress.

elements.title: Neuron Bursts Can Mimic Famous AI Learning Strategy
elements.contents: A new model of learning centers on bursts of neural activity that act as teaching signals — approximating backpropagation, the algorithm behind learning in AI.

elements.title: A New Link to an Old Model Could Crack the Mystery of Deep Learning
elements.contents: To help them explain the shocking success of deep neural networks, researchers are turning to older but better-understood models of machine learning.

elements.title: Major Quantum Computing Strategy Suffers Serious Setbacks
elements.contents: So-called topological quantum computing would avoid many of the problems that stand in the way of full-scale quantum computers. But high-profile missteps have led some experts to question whether the field is fooling itself.
